title: Use packaged C# compiler
body:
This avoids diffs in the genapi-generated public interface that are happening
because of changes in generated code for records in Roslyn 3.10.

commit.message:
Use packaged C# compiler

This avoids diffs in the genapi-generated public interface that are happening
because of changes in generated code for records in Roslyn 3.10.

nodes.body: Wait, we should take this to 16.11 to avoid annoyance while we're working there. For 16.10 I don't think it's worth the headache but could be persuaded.
